attributes.action: raise the issue of the Premier League's failure to deduct points from West Ham United at the earliest opportunity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Questions remain to be answered about how West Ham United were able to field ineligible players for much of the season and not subsequently face a points deduction. We the undersigned would appreciate the Prime Minister's intervention to attempt to resolve these issues as soon as possible.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
